availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Artemecia McGregor. Father of James W. McGregor, Sarah McGregor, Mary McGregor, Margaret McGregor, John McGregor, and Rebecca McGregor. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 94A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 58-9.
"Shadrach McGregor (1826-1901)," Find A Grave, Memorial #68992331, accessed June 2, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/68992331.
